trans-unit.source: You must agree with our Terms of Service
trans-unit.target: Trebuie să fii de acord cu Termenii de utilizare a serviciului nostru
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to create a new MEGA account without accept previously the 'Terms of Service'.

trans-unit.source: Failed to confirm account. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la confirmarea contului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Your account has been created, confirmed and activated. You will be logged in automatically.
trans-unit.target: Contul tău a fost creat, confirmat şi activat. Vei fi automat autentificat.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully.
Title of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Check your e-mail and click the link to login and confirm your account
trans-unit.target: Verifică e-mailul şi dă clic pe link pentru a te autentifica şi a confirma contul
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: MEGA Cloud Drive account creation failed. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Crearea contului MEGA a unităţii cloud a eşuat. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the creation of a MEGA account failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the creation of a MEGA account failed - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the creation of a folder failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the creation of a folder failed - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when create a folder successfully.
Title of the dialog displayed when create a folder successfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to retrieve a download link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la preluarea unui link de descărcare. Te rugăm să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when failed to retrieve a download link.
Title of the dialog displayed when failed to retrieve a download link - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to download file. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la descărcarea fişierului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Could not retrieve files and folders from MEGA. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Nu se pot prelua fişierele şi folderele din MEGA. Încearcă din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to fetch nodes from the MEGA cloud service failed.
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to fetch nodes from the MEGA cloud service failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to create folder. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la crearea folderului. Te rugăm să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to create a folder failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to create a folder failed - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a link to a node failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a link to a node failed - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image preview failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image preview failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Image successfully exported to 'saved pictures' album
trans-unit.target: Imagine exportată cu succes în albumul 'Fotografii salvate'
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a image is saved/exported successfully saved to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device.
Title of the dialog displayed when a image is saved/exported successfully saved to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Error exporting image to 'saved pictures' album. Please try again
trans-unit.target: Eroare la exportarea imaginii în albumul 'Fotografii salvate'. Încearcă din nou
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to save/export an image to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device.
Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to save/export an image to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device - (String as short as possible).

Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import an image.
Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import an image - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The MEGA link was copied to your clipboard
trans-unit.target: Linkul MEGA este copiat în clipboard
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard finished successfully.
Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: MEGA Cloud Drive login failed. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Autentificarea MEGA a unităţii cloud a eşuat. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the login to the MEGA cloud service api fails. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the login to the MEGA cloud service api fails - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Destination folder is the same as the source folder. Move cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Folderul de destinaţie este acelaşi ca folderul sursă. Mutare anulată.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move nodes and the destination folder is the same than the source folder.
Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move nodes and the destination folder is the same than the source folder - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to move item. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la mutarea elementului. Te rugăm să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move a file failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move a file failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Parolele nu se potrivesc. Te rugăm să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create a MEGA account and the introduced passwords don't match.

trans-unit.source: The image was saved to your photo album
trans-unit.target: Imaginea e salvată în albumul foto
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when save successfully a single picture in the photo album.
Title of the dialog displayed when save successfully a single picture in the photo album - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to remove {0}?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove definitely an itemfrom the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to do it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name of the item to be removed in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed, asking for confirmation to do it - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when remove successfully a node definitely from the rubbish bin.
Title of the dialog displayed when remove successfully a node definitely from the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove definitely an item node from the rubbish bin failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove definitely an item node from the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Please fill in your chosen password.
trans-unit.target: Te rugăm să completezi parola aleasă.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for confirm account are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: Please fill in your name, e-mail address and password
trans-unit.target: Completează numele, adresa de e-mail şi parola
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for create account are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: Please fill in your e-mail address and your MEGA password.
trans-unit.target: Te rugăm să completezi adresa de e-mail şi parola MEGA.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for login are not filled in.
Title of the dialog displayed when any required field is not filled in - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Export current image to 'saved pictures' album?
trans-unit.target: Expoţi imaginea actuală în albumul 'Fotografii salvate'?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to save a image to the 'saved pictures' album, asking for confirmation to do it.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to save a image to the 'saved pictures' album, asking for confirmation to do it - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You are not logged into MEGA. Please re-login.
trans-unit.target: Nu eşti autentificat pe MEGA. Te rugăm să te reautentifici.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is online and is trying to do any operation that requires connection.
Title of the dialog displayed when the user is online and is trying to do any operation that requires connection - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image thumbnail failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image thumbnail failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to retrieve your account details. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la preluarea datelor contului tău. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user account details failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user account details failed - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when a user logged out successfully.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user logged out successfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to logout. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la deconectare. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the logout to the MEGA cloud service api fails. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the logout to the MEGA cloud service api fails - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to remove {0} items?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be removed in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when remove successfully multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when remove successfully multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to move item to rubbish bin. Please try again
trans-unit.target: Eşec la mutarea elementului în coşul de gunoi. Încearcă din nou
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move nodes to the rubbish bin failed.

trans-unit.target: Mutarea în coşul de gunoi a eşuat
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move nodes to the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to move {0} to the rubbish bin?
trans-unit.target: Sigur doreşti să muţi {0} în coşul de gunoi?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move a single node to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name of the node to be moved in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to move a single node to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Item successfully moved to the rubbish bin
trans-unit.target: Element mutat cu succes în coşul de gunoi
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when move successfully one single node to the rubbish bin.
Title of the dialog displayed when move successfully one single node to the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to move {0} items to the rubbish bin?
trans-unit.target: Sigur doreşti să muţi în coşul de gunoi {0} elemente?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move multiple nodes to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to move multiple nodes to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: {0} items moved to the rubbish bin
trans-unit.target: {0} elemente mutate în coşul de gunoi
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when move successfully multiple nodes to the rubbish bin. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when move successfully multiple nodes to the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have {0} pending transfers. Pending transfers will be canceled. Are you sure you want to logout?
trans-unit.target: Ai {0} transferuri în curs. Transferurile în curs vor fi anulate. Sigur doreşti să te deconectezi?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to logout the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to logout. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of pending transfers in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to logout the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to logout - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have {0} pending transfers. Pending transfers will be canceled. Are you sure you want to exit?
trans-unit.target: Ai {0} transferuri în curs. Transferurile în curs vor fi anulate. Sigur doreşti să ieşi?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to exit the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to exit. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of pending transfers in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to exit the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to exit - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The account is already confirmed. You can now login.
trans-unit.target: Contul e deja confirmat. Te poţi autentifica acum.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed in cases that the app requires that the user type the password and the user types a wrong password.
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the app requires that the user type the password and the user types a wrong password - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have selected over {0} items ({1}) to download. Do you want to proceed?
trans-unit.target: Ai selectat peste {0} elemente ({1}) pentru descărcare. Doreşti să continui?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process. Preserve the {0} and ({1}) codes because is for include the maximum reliable download number and the precise number of nodes to be downloaded in runtime.

Title of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Do you want to automatically export image files to your photo album after download? You can change this setting on the settings page afterwards. Other file types will only be stored in the local storage of the app.
trans-unit.target: Doreşti să exporţi automat fişierele de tip IMAGINE în albumul foto după descărcare? Poţi schimba această setare din pagina de setări ulterior. Alte tipuri de fişiere vor fi stocate doar în stocarea locală a aplicaţiei.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards.

trans-unit.target: Eşec la punerea pe pauză a transferurilor
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to pause transfers failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to pause transfers failed - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to resume transfers failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to resume transfers failed.

trans-unit.source: Please select at least one picture for upload
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to do a multi image upload and haven't selected any element.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to do a multi image upload and haven't selected any element - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to prepare image: {0} for upload
trans-unit.target: Eşec la pregătirea imaginii: {0} pentru încărcare
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a image for upload failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the file name in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a image for upload failed - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a photo failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a photo failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Could not find the selected file
trans-unit.target: Nu se poate găsi fişierul selectat
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to open a file that can't be found and the process failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user try to open a file that can't be found and the process failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to open the selected file
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to open a file failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to open a file failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to upload the selfie picture
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a selfie picture failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a selfie picture failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Could not load files and folders from MEGA. Please try again or click on refresh.
trans-unit.target: Nu se pot încărca fişiere şi foldere de pe MEGA. Încearcă din nou sau dă clic pe reîmprospătare.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the nodes of the MEGA cloud service.
Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the nodes of the MEGA cloud service - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Your PIN lock codes do not match. Please re-type them and make sure they are equal
trans-unit.target: Codurile PIN nu se potrivesc. Retastează-le şi asigură-te că sunt la fel
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

trans-unit.source: PIN lock codes do not match
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have been logged out on this device from another location
trans-unit.target: Ai fost deconectat de pe acest dispozitiv dintr-o altă locaţie
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error).

trans-unit.source: Operation not allowed, you will exceed the storage limit of your account. Do you want to upgrade your account?
trans-unit.target: Operaţie nepermisă, vei depăşi limita de stocare a contului. Doreşti să upgradezi contul?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type.

Title of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have not selected a default download location for your files.To proceed with the download, please select a destination folder or go to settings in order to set up your default download location.
trans-unit.target: Nu ai selectat o locaţie implicită de descărcare pentru fişierele tale. Pentru a continua cu descărcarea, te rugăm să selectezi un folder de destinaţie sau să mergi la setări pentru a configura locaţia implicită de descărcare.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to download some nodes and the app doesn't have configured a default download location. Asks the user to select a location for this download or configure a default location.

trans-unit.source: Failed to prepare file: {0} for upload
trans-unit.target: Eşec la pregătirea fişierului: {0} pentru încărcare
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the file name in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed - (String as short as possible).
Title of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error) - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to copy the selected file: [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You do not have permission to copy this file type to the destination folder. Are you trying to save/copy a file of an unsupported type to an SD card? Please try to save/copy the file to your device's internal memory instead.
trans-unit.target: Nu ai permisiunea de a copia acest tip de fişiere în dosarul de destinaţie. Încerci să salvezi/copiezi un fişier de un tip nesuportat pe un card SD? Te rugăm să încerci să salvezi/copiezi fişierul în memoria internă a dispozitivului în schimb.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type).

Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type) - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to copy the Recovery Key to your clipboard. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la copierea cheii de recuperare în clipboard. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails to copy the user's Recovery Key to the clipboard to be saved or exported.
Message of the dialog displayed when fails to copy the user's Recovery Key to the clipboard to be saved or exported - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Current PIN lock is not correct or does not match
trans-unit.target: PIN-ul actual nu e corect sau nu se potriveşte
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

Title of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code - (String as short as possible). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

trans-unit.target: Cheie de recuperare copiată în clipboard
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when copy the user's Recovery Key to the clipboard to be saved or exported.
Title of the dialog displayed when copy the user's Recovery Key to the clipboard to be saved or exported - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: PIN lock must be at least four digits
trans-unit.target: PIN-ul trebuie să fie de cel puţin 4 cifre
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: Cache-ul a fost şters cu succes
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.
Title of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.

trans-unit.source: Not enough free memory space to complete this operation. The app will shut down now
trans-unit.target: Spaţiu liber insuficient pentru a încheia această operaţie. Aplicaţia se va închide acum
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device.
Title of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device - (String as short as possible).

Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option to only download into the local folder of the app and don't export automatically to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).

Title of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards - (String as short as possible).
Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option automatically download to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to select folder. Please, try again or select another folder: [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la selectarea folderului. Încearcă din nou sau selectează alt folder: [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to upload file. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la încărcarea fişierului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a node failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a node failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to select file(s). Please, try again [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la selectarea fişierului(elor). Te rugăm să reîncerci [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select files failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to select files failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: E-mail incorect. Te rugăm să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user types a malformed email address.

trans-unit.source: Incorrect e-mail address or password. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Adresă de e-mail sau parolă incorectă. Te rugăm să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to login with an e-mail that is not associated with a MEGA account or type a wrong password. Preserve the MEGA word in uppercase.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {0}?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to delete permanently a node, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include name of the node to be removed in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to delete permanently a node, asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to retrieve your user data. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la obţinerea datelor utilizatorului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user data failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: Preluarea datelor privind utilizatorul a eşuat
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user data failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to capture photo. Please, try again [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la capturarea fotografiei. Te rugăm să reîncerci [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to capture photo or video. Please, try again [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la capturarea foto sau video. Te rugăm să reîncerci [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo or video failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo or video failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to capture video. Please, try again [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la capturarea videoclipului. Te rugăm să reîncerci [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture video failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to capture video failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to save settings. Please, try again [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la salvarea setărilor. Te rugăm să reîncerci [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to save settings failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to save settings failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when trying to open a shortcut. Maybe it is an invalid shortcut or the destination folder was deleted.
trans-unit.target: A apărut o eroare la încercarea de deschidere a scurtăturii. Poate este o scurtătură invalidă sau folderul de destinaţie a fost şters.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invalid shortcut.
Title of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invalid shortcut - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The credit card information is not correct. The credit card will not be charged.
trans-unit.target: Informaţiile cardului de credit nu sunt corecte. Nu ţi se va retrage nicio sumă de pe cardul de credit.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed.

trans-unit.target: Stocarea cardului de credit a eşuat
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Please fill in all the required fields and try again.
trans-unit.target: Te rugăm să completezi câmpurile necesare şi să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for credit card payment are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: The credit card number, month/year of expiration and the CVV should be numeric. Please check that everything is correct and try again.
trans-unit.target: Numărul cardului de credit, luna/anul expirării şi CVV-ul ar trebui să fie numerice. Te rugăm să verifici ca toate să fie corecte şi să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user fill some data with a wrong format during a credit card payment.
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the user types some data with a wrong format - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You are about to cancel your MEGA subscription. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to help change your mind.
trans-unit.target: Eşti pe cale de a anula abonamentul MEGA. Te rugăm să ne spui dacă există ceva ce putem face pentru a te răzgândi.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription, asking him send a feedback message.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your feedback! Are you sure you want to cancel your MEGA subscription?
trans-unit.target: Îţi mulţumim pentru feedback! Sigur doreşti să anulezi abonamentul MEGA?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription. This sentence is for give thanks to the user for the feedback sent during the cancellation process and asking for confirmation to do it.

trans-unit.source: The subscription has not been canceled successfully. Please contact support@mega.nz to cancel your subscription.
trans-unit.target: Abonamentul nu a fost anulat corect. Te rugăm să contactezi support@mega.nz pentru a anula abonamentul.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully - (String as short as possible).
Title of the dialogs displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Please give us your feedback. Thanks.
trans-unit.target: Te rugăm să ne oferi feedbackul tău. Mulţumim.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for cancel subscription are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed. Your credit card has not been charged.
trans-unit.target: Operaţia a eşuat. Nu ţi s-a retras nicio sumă de pe cardul de credit.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account failed - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account finished successfully.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to retrieve the available payment methods. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la obţinerea de metode de plată disponibile. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment methods failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: Eroare la obţinerea metodelor de plată
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment methods failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to retrieve the payment Url. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la obţinerea URL-ului de plată. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment Url failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: Obţinerea URL-ului pentru plată a eşuat
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment Url failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Background agents for MEGA have been disabled by the user
trans-unit.target: Agenţi cu executare în fundal pentru MEGA au fost dezactivaţi de utilizator
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases when the user has disabled background agents for this application

trans-unit.target: Agenţi cu executare în fundal dezactivaţi
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed in cases when the user has disabled background agents for this application

trans-unit.source: In order for the automatic Camera Uploads to work correctly, you need to enable the option "Stay logged in". Do you want to enable this option?
trans-unit.target: Pentru ca încărcări cameră automate să funcţioneze corect, trebuie să activezi opţiunea „Rămâi autentificat”. Doreşti să activezi această opţiune?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user wants to enable auto camera uploads but Stay logged in is disabled.

trans-unit.target: Cerinţe obligatorii pentru încărcări cameră automate
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the user wants to enable auto camera uploads but Stay logged in is disabled.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to remove the contact {0}?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove a contact, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include email of the contact to be removed in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove a contact asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The contact invitation could not be sent. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Invitaţia de contact nu a putut fi trimisă. Te rugăm să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: User {0} has been invited and will appear on your contact list once they have accepted the invitation.
trans-unit.target: Utilizatorul {0} a fost invitat şi va apărea în lista de contacte de îndată ce va accepta invitaţia.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact finished successfully - (String as short as possible). Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the contact email in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact finished successfully - (String as short as possible).
Descripton of the task that automatic uploads photos tot MEGA. Seen in the background services Settings screen

trans-unit.source: Your account has been updated. Do you want to check the new account details?
trans-unit.target: Contul tău a fost actualizat. Doreşti să verifici detaliile noi ale contului?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the account is updated (upgraded or downgraded).
Title of the dialog displayed when the account is updated (upgraded or downgraded).

trans-unit.source: Our SSL/TLS certificate can't be verified. You could be affected by a man-in-the-middle attack.
trans-unit.target: Certificatul nostru SSL/TLS nu poate fi verificat. Ai putea fi afectat de un atac de tip man-in-the-middle.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when MEGA SSL key can't be verified (API_ESSL Error).
Title of the dialog displayed when MEGA SSL key can't be verified (API_ESSL Error).

trans-unit.source: The Auto Camera Upload background task has failed. You can re-enable it on the settings page.
trans-unit.target: Sarcina de pe fundal a serviciului încărcări cameră automate a eşuat. O poţi reactiva de pe pagina de setări.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the auto camera upload service failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the auto camera upload service failed.

trans-unit.source: Failed to remove the contact {0}. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la eliminarea contactului {0}. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a contact failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the contact email in runtime. Preserve the [{1}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a contact failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Do you want to remove {0} contacts?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple contacts, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of contacts to be removed in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple contacts asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to change password. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la schimbarea parolei. Te rugăm să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to change the MEGA account password failed.
Message of the dialog displayed when change a MEGA account password succesfully.

trans-unit.source: The new and the old password must not match.
trans-unit.target: Parola nouă şi cea veche nu se pot potrivi.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to change his/her MEGA account password and the new password is equal to the old password.

trans-unit.source: Please fill in your old MEGA password and your new MEGA password.
trans-unit.target: Te rugăm să completezi parola veche MEGA şi parola nouă MEGA.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for change password are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: Failed to close the session. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la închiderea sesiunii. Te rugăm să încerci din nou [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to close or kill all sessions (except current) failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.source: The remaining sessions were successfully closed.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when close or kill all sessions (except current) successfully.

trans-unit.source: Failed to close the session. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la închiderea sesiunii. Te rugăm să încerci din nou [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to close or kill session failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.source: The session has been successfully closed.
trans-unit.target: Sesiunea a fost închisă cu succes.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when close or kill a session succesfully.

trans-unit.source: Failed to clear the rubbish bin. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la golirea coşului de gunoi. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to empty the rubbish bin failed.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all files from the rubbish bin?
trans-unit.target: Sigur doreşti să ştergi definitiv toate fişierele din coşul de gunoi?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to empty the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to do it.

trans-unit.source: The rubbish bin has been cleared successfully.
trans-unit.target: Coşul de gunoi a fost golit cu succes.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when empty the rubbish bin succesfully.

trans-unit.source: You are trying to add your own email as a contact.
trans-unit.target: Încerci să îţi adaugi propriul e-mail ca contact.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed because the user is trying to his/her own e-mail.

trans-unit.source: Failed to remove link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la eliminarea linkului. Te rugăm să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a link to a node failed.

trans-unit.source: You cannot perform this action. Please connect to the Internet and try again.
trans-unit.target: Nu poţi efectua această acţiune. Te rugăm să te conectezi la internet şi să reîncerci.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to perform any online action without an active Internet connection.

trans-unit.source: You don't have access to the path '{0}'. Please select another one and try again.
trans-unit.target: Nu ai acces la calea '{0}'. Te rugăm să selectezi alta şi să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that the app or the user doesn't have access to a folder path in the device memory. For example to download a file/folder, create a new folder, etc. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file/folder path in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the app or the user doesn't have access to a folder path in the device memory. For example to download a file/folder, create a new folder, etc.

trans-unit.source: The name of the file '{0}' is not valid or has illegal characters. Please change it and try again.
trans-unit.target: Numele fişierului '{0}' nu este valid sau are caractere ilegale. Te rugăm să îl schimbi şi să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that a file name is not valid or has illegal characters. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file name in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the file name is not valid or has illegal characters - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The path of the file/folder '{0}' is too long. Please change it and try again.
trans-unit.target: Calea fişierului/folderului '{0}' este prea lungă. Te rugăm să o schimbi şi să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that the file/folder path is too long. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file/folder name in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the file/folder path is too long - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The name or path of the folder '{0}' is not valid or has illegal characters. Please change it and try again.
trans-unit.target: Numele căii sau folderului '{0}' nu este valid sau are caractere ilegale. Te rugăm să îl schimbi şi să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that a folder name or path is not valid or has illegal characters. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file name in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the file name or path is not valid or has illegal characters - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invliad lick (NO KEY).

trans-unit.source: Failed to select the folder. Please try again or select another folder.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la selectarea folderului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou sau să selectezi un alt folder.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed.
Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import an image.

trans-unit.source: Failed to prepare file(s) for upload. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la pregătirea fişierului(elor) pentru încărcare. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file(s) for upload failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare file(s) for upload failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to download the file. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la descărcarea fişierului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load something (nodes, out shares, in shares, etc.) - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to load incoming shared items from MEGA. Please try again or click on refresh.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la încărcarea elementelor partajate primite de pe MEGA. Te rugăm să încerci din nou sau dă clic pe reîmprospătare.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the incoming shared items.

trans-unit.source: Failed to load outgoing shared items from MEGA. Please try again or click on refresh.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la încărcarea elementelor partajate trimise de pe MEGA. Te rugăm să încerci din nou sau dă clic pe reîmprospătare.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the outgoing shared items.

trans-unit.source: Failed to delete settings. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la ştergerea setărilor. Te rugăm să încerci din nou. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to delete settings failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to delete settings failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to load settings. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Eşec la încărcarea setărilor. Te rugăm să încerci din nou . [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to load settings failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to load settings failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to copy the MEGA link to your clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la copierea linkului MEGA în clipboard.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard.
Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: If you agree, the current account will be logged out and all Offline data will be erased. Do you want to continue?
trans-unit.target: Dacă eşti de acord, contul actual va fi deconectat şi toate datele offline vor fi şterse. Doreşti să continui?
trans-unit.note: Message of the warning dialog shown when you try to confirm an account but you are logged in with another one.

trans-unit.source: You are logged in with another account
trans-unit.target: Eşti autentificat cu un alt cont
trans-unit.note: Title of the warning dialog shown when you try to confirm an account but you are logged in with another one - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: To access this folder/file, you will need its Decryption key. If you do not have the key, contact the creator of the link.
trans-unit.target: Pentru a accesa acest folder/fişier, vei avea nevoie de cheia de decriptare a acestuia. Dacă nu ai cheia, contactează creatorul linkului.
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when you tap on a encrypted file/folder link that can't be opened because it doesn't include the key to see its contents.
Alert title shown when you tap on a encrypted file/folder link that can't be opened because it doesn't include the key to see its contents - (String as short as possible).
Alert title shown when you have written a decryption key not valid - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: This could be due to the following reasons: - The file has been removed because of a ToS/AUP violation. - Invalid URL – the link you are trying to access does not exist. - The file has been deleted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Acest lucru ar putea fi din cauza următoarelor motive: - Fişierul a fost eliminat din cauza unei încălcări a ToS/AUP. - URL invalid – linkul pe care încerci să-l accesezi nu există. - Fişierul a fost şters de către utilizator.
trans-unit.note: Error message shown when you open a file link and it's no longer available. It explains the reasons that could be causing it. Keep "\n"

trans-unit.source: This could be due to the following reasons: - The folder link has been removed because of a ToS/AUP violation. - Invalid URL – the link you are trying to access does not exist. - The folder link has been deleted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Acest lucru ar putea fi din cauza următoarelor motive: - Linkul folderului a fost eliminat din cauza unei încălcări a ToS/AUP. - URL invalid – linkul pe care încerci să-l accesezi nu există. - Linkul folderului a fost şters de către utilizator.
trans-unit.note: Error message shown when a folder link doesn't exist. Keep "\n"
Error title shown when you open a file or folder link and it's no longer available - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the process to open a link failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to open a link failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You don't have access to the selected download path. Please select a different download path and try again.
trans-unit.target: Nu ai acces la calea de descărcare selectată. Te rugăm să selectezi o cale de descărcare diferită şi să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a file/folder failed because the app or the user don't have access permission to the destination folder.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a file/folder failed because the app or the user don't have access permission to the destination folder

trans-unit.source: Failed to copy item. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la copierea elementului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a node failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a node failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The log ({0}) will be deleted from the Offline section.
trans-unit.target: Fişierul log ({0}) va fi şters din secţiunea Offline.
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when the DEBUG mode is disabled. Preserve the ({0}) code because is for include the file name in runtime.
Alert title shown when the DEBUG mode is disabled - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: A log will be created in the Offline section ({0}).
trans-unit.target: Un fişier log va fi creat în secţiunea Offline ({0}).
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when the DEBUG mode is enabled. Preserve the ({0}) code because is for include the file name in runtime.
Alert title shown when the DEBUG mode is enabled - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Debug mode is enabled. Do you want to disable it?
trans-unit.target: Modul de depanare este activat. Doreşti să-l dezactivezi?
trans-unit.note: Message of the alert dialog displayed when the app starts and the DEBUG mode is enable. This alert is to try to avoid that the user forget disable the DEBUG mode and the log file size grows a lot in the offline section.
Message of the alert dialog displayed when the app starts and the DEBUG mode is enable - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Item shared by the Windows Phone MEGA app.
trans-unit.target: Element partajat de aplicaţia MEGA pentru Windows Phone.
trans-unit.note: Message or description for the shared resource or the dialog displayed when the user is sharing one item from MEGA with other app of his Windows Phone device - (String as short as possible).
Title for the shared resource or the dialog displayed when the user is sharing one item from MEGA with other app of his Windows Phone device - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Items shared by the Windows Phone MEGA app.
trans-unit.target: Elemente partajate de aplicaţia MEGA pentru Windows Phone.
trans-unit.note: Message or description for the shared resource or the dialog displayed when the user is sharing multiple items from MEGA with other app of his Windows Phone device - (String as short as possible).
Title for the shared resource or the dialog displayed when the user is sharing multiple items from MEGA with other app of his Windows Phone device - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to import folder. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la importarea folderului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import a folder.
Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import a folder - (String as short as possible).
Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import a link - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to share item(s) from MEGA. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la partajarea elementului(elor) de pe MEGA. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to share item(s) from MEGA with other app fails.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to share item(s) from MEGA with other app fails - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Your purchase of a MEGA subscription has failed because you have already purchased this item.
trans-unit.target: Achiziţia unui abonament MEGA a eşuat deoarece ai achiziţionat deja acest element.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user already has purchased an item from the store
Title of the dialog displayed when a user already has purchased an item from the store

trans-unit.source: Your purchase of a MEGA subscription has failed or has been cancelled. Please try again or contact Windows Store support.
trans-unit.target: Achiziţionarea unui abonament MEGA a eşuat sau a fost anulată. Te rugăm să încerci din nou sau să contactezi asistenţa Windows Store.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user tries to purchase an item from the store and it failed

trans-unit.target: Achiziţia a eşuat sau a fost anulată
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user tries to purchase an item from the store and it failed

trans-unit.source: Your MEGA subscription purchase has succeeded.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user has purchased an item from the store
Title of the dialog displayed when a user has purchased an item from the store

trans-unit.source: Your purchase of a MEGA subscription has not passed validation at our licence server. On restart of this app we will retry to validate your subscription licences. Please contact MEGA support if the error continues.
trans-unit.target: Achiziţionarea unui abonament MEGA nu a trecut validarea la serverul nostru de licenţă. La repornirea acestei aplicaţii vom reîncerca să validăm licenţele de abonament. Te rugăm să contactezi suportul MEGA dacă eroarea continuă.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that validation of the IAP purchase has failed at the MEGA License server
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that validation of the IAP purchase has failed at the MEGA License server

trans-unit.source: The account that created this link has been terminated due to multiple violations of our Terms of Service.
trans-unit.target: Contul care a creat acest link a fost desfiinţat din cauza mai multor încălcări ale Termenilor de utilizare a serviciului nostru.
trans-unit.note: Error message shown when you open a file/folder link (or other shared resource) and it's no longer available because the the associated user account has been terminated due to multiple violations of our Terms of Service.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Could not download the folder link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Nu se poate descărca linkul folderului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to download a folder link.
Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import a node - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Could not import the folder link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Nu se poate importa linkul folderului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import a folder link.

trans-unit.source: This e-mail address has already registered an account with MEGA.
trans-unit.target: Această adresă de e-mail a înregistrat deja un cont cu MEGA.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the users tries to create an account with an email already in use.

trans-unit.source: The account confirmation link that you are using is incomplete. Please check the link length and be sure that you have copied the entire link then try again.
trans-unit.target: Linkul de confirmare a contului pe care îl foloseşti este incomplet. Te rugăm să verifici lungimea linkului şi să te asiguri că ai copiat întregul linkul, apoi încearcă din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account but the confirm link is incomplete because it has less characters than it should (probably because the user hasn't copied and pasted the entire link).

trans-unit.source: The link you are using for a new signup is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Linkul pe care îl foloseşti pentru o înregistrare nouă nu este valid.
trans-unit.note: Message of the warning dialog shown when the user tries to make a new sign up using an invalid link (#newsignup).

trans-unit.source: Your account was terminated due to a breach of MEGA's Terms of Service, such as abuse of rights of others; sharing and/or importing illegal data; or system abuse.
trans-unit.target: Your account was terminated due to a breach of MEGA's Terms of Service, such as abuse of rights of others; sharing and/or importing illegal data; or system abuse.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has been blocked.

trans-unit.source: Your account has not been confirmed yet.
trans-unit.target: Contul tău nu a fost încă confirmat.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has not been confirmed yet.

trans-unit.source: You have attempted to log in too many times. Please wait until {0} and try again.
trans-unit.target: Ai încercat să te autentifici de prea multe ori. Te rugăm să aştepţi până la {0} şi să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and has made several failed attempts. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the exact time until the user has to wait.
Title of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has been blocked.

trans-unit.source: Failed to share item(s) from MEGA. The destination application seems busy. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la partajarea elementului(elor) de la MEGA. Aplicaţia de destinaţie pare ocupată. Te rugăm să încerci din nou mai târziu.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to share item(s) from MEGA with other app fails because the destination app is busy.

trans-unit.source: Failed to retrieve node details. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la preluarea detaliilor nodului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get node details failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get node details failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: There is an unknown error in the download path. Please try again and if it continues to fail, please contact support@mega.nz. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Există o eroare necunoscută în calea de descărcare. Te rugăm să încerci din nou şi dacă continuă să eşueze, contactează support@mega.nz. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a file/folder failed because an unknown error in the download path. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.source: The file/folder of the link that you are trying to open was not found. You are probably logged in to a different account. Please, log in to the correct account and try again.
trans-unit.target: Fişierul/folderul linkului pe care încerci să îl deschizi nu a fost găsit. Probabil că eşti autentificat într-un cont diferit. Te rugăm să te autentifici în contul corect şi să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when trying to open a link of an internal node and this node is not found in the account in which the user is logged in.
Title of the dialog displayed when trying to open a link of an internal node and this node is not found in the account in which the user is logged in - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Your queued transfer exceeds the current transfer quota available for your account and may therefore be interrupted.
trans-unit.target: Transferul în coadă depăşeşte cota de transfer actuală disponibilă pentru contul tău şi, prin urmare, poate fi întreruptă.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user exceeds the transfer quota limits of the account (transfer overquota error).
Message of the dialog displayed when a user exceeds the transfer quota limits of the account (transfer overquota error) - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel all the pending downloads?
trans-unit.target: Sigur doreşti să anulezi toate descărcările în aşteptare?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user wants to cancel all the pending downloads.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel all the pending uploads?
trans-unit.target: Sigur doreşti să anulezi toate încărcările în aşteptare?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user wants to cancel all the pending uploads.

trans-unit.source: Failed to view the contact details. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la vizualizarea detaliilor contactului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou mai târziu.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to view a contact details failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to view a contact details failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to show the upload options. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la afişarea opţiunilor de încărcare. Te rugăm să încerci din nou mai târziu.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to show the upload options failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to show the upload options failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the log file in an external location to use it later?
trans-unit.target: Doreşti să salvezi fişierul log într-o locaţie externă pentru a-l folosi mai târziu?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed to ask the user if wants to save the generated log file in an external location of the app.
Title of the dialog displayed to ask the user if wants to save the generated log file in an external location of the app - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to share the file/folder link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la partajarea linkului fişierului/folderului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to share a file/folder link.
Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to share a file/folder link.

trans-unit.source: Failed to open the internal file/folder of the link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Eşec la deschiderea fişierului/folderului intern al linkului. Te rugăm să încerci din nou.
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when fail trying to open a link of an internal node.

trans-unit.source: Failed to open the internal file/folder
trans-unit.target: Failed to open the internal file/folder
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when fail trying to open a link of an internal node - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to clear cache. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Failed to clear cache. Please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to clear cache failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to clear cache failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Error preparing downloads. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Error preparing downloads. Please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare files or folders for download failed.

trans-unit.source: Your account has been suspended due to multiple breaches of MEGA's Terms of Service. Please check your email inbox.
trans-unit.target: Your account has been suspended due to multiple breaches of MEGA's Terms of Service. Please check your email inbox.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has been blocked for multiple copyright violation.
